page.title: 05FARMING 04160531
page.content: Our D-block covers a rural area and there are about seven large farms and a number of medium and small farms.Nearly all the farms are mixed farms,which not only grow crops but also keep animals,usually cows and sheep. Most farms in our D-block grow cereals,mainly barley and wheat but they also grow some oats . They grow potatoes to sell and turnips for cattle food.There is quite a lot of dairy farming so farmers grow grass for hay and silage.Most of the cattle are Friesian.Quite a lot of sheep are kept. Some interesting farm names in our block:_{Beech Burn Farm,Cringle Dyke {Farm,Furness Mill Farm,Hunwick Hall {Farm,Quarry Farm,Quarry Burn {Farm,Blakely Hill Farm,Constantine {Farm. }
